text:
Her boyfriend's a dick
And he brings a gun to school
And he'd simply kick
My ass if he knew the truth
He lives on my block
And drives an Iroc
But he doesn't know who I am
And he doesn't give a damn about me.
#TeenChoice #ChoiceFandom #Directioners @onedirection

tweets.text: Police in Italy took a policeman's gun while he was investigated for fraud, but not when his wife reported domestic abuse. He later shot his wife and two children. "That’s the gap in values we are facing," says a domestic violence advocate. https://t.co/s88SBZ9FUj
